author: boudoul
body:
Greetings
This PR aims to clean some old/obsolete/unused files in the SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Geometry packages. Most of them are coming from the good old time of slhc releases .
Presumbaly this package can be cleaned further but i'm doing gradually...
title: Cleaning Obsolete files in SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Geometry
